on reading compounds: 塔屋【トウヤ】rooftop structure, e.g. tower, elevator machine room, etc.
kun reading compounds: 屋【や】(something) shop, somebody who sells (something) or works as (something), somebody with a (certain) personality trait, house, roof
屋敷【やしき】residence, estate, grounds, premises, mansion
長屋【ながや】tenement house, row house
総会屋【そうかいや】extortionist that threatens to disrupt stock-holder meetings
